schema.description:
客户端Token，用于保证请求的幂等性。

从您的客户端生成一个参数值，确保不同请求间该参数值唯一。**ClientToken**只支持ASCII字符。

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "ZoneId": "AgIDE1MA_150", "RequestId": "E246E023-F2EB-4034-83F7-B13FCF31459C" }","errorExample":"{ "Message": "The request processing has failed due to some unknown error, exception or failure", "RequestId": "E246E023-F2EB-4034-83F7-B13FCF31459C", "Code": "InternalError" }"},{"type":"xml","example":" B5174E6E-0AA6-4524-BCE4-603DED055319 AgIDE1MA_151 ","errorExample":" F0B47FE6-C774-4833-9028-B073588A8FAA InternalError The request processing has failed due to some unknown error, exception or failure "}]
title: 删除zone
